corelogic.transform
Interface Transformer

All Known Subinterfaces:
XmlTransformer
All Known Implementing Classes:
Base64TransformerImpl, BinaryTransformerImpl, CommaTransformerImpl, ExcelTransformerImpl, HtmlTransformerImpl, JSONPTransformerImpl, JSONTransformerImpl, ObjectTransformerImpl, SoapTransformerImpl, TabSplitTextTransformerImpl, TransformerBase, XhtmlTransformerImpl, XmlTransformerImpl
public interface Transformer

DataSet을 원하는 OutputStream에 변환하여 기록한다.
